Name: The Wentworth
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: The pleasing tang of bourbon adds backbone to this fruity herbal cocktail.
History: Created in 2003 by Sharon Cooper at the Harvest Restaurant, Pomfret, Connecticut, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of The Wentworth contains 140 calories
